sections.title: What is Environment Setup?
sections.content: Environment Setup covers the foundations you need before writing robot code. You will learn how the FTC SDK works, how OpModes are structured, and how to use telemetry for debugging. This section also explains the Control Hub and Expansion Hub hardware.

sections.title: Suggested Order
sections.content: New teams should complete these topics in order. FTC SDK Basics introduces the core concepts; OpMode Structure and Linear vs Iterative OpModes show how to organize your code; Telemetry Logging teaches debugging; and Control Hub & Expansion Hub covers the hardware platform.
